text: Related to this topic, data scaling can really help the homogenous self dual embedding solvers convergence. I’d imagine that it could help with the derivative as well if the linear system solve is the dominant part?

text: Yup we can safely assume the linear solves are the largest part (+ the LSQR maybe)
